snippet: The General Assembly’s vote was a victory for Gov. Martin O’Malley, who said on Monday that he would also sign a bill to decriminalize possession of small amounts of marijuana.
abstract: Maryland lawmakers vote to raise minimum wage to $10.10 an hour, giving Gov Martin O'Malley a victory on his top priority in his last year in office.
lead_paragraph: The General Assembly’s vote was a victory for Gov. Martin O’Malley, who said on Monday that he would also sign a bill to decriminalize possession of small amounts of marijuana.

headline.main: Pressing Obama’s Agenda, Maryland Lawmakers Raise Minimum Wage
headline.print_headline: Pressing Obama’s Agenda, Maryland Lawmakers Raise Minimum Wage
